title: Clone-style college website based on darshan.ac.in with new branding and theme

requirements.text: Create a clone-style marketing website modeled on the overall structure and information architecture of https://darshan.ac.in, but with fully replaced branding so it is clearly a different site (new institution name, logo/wordmark, and consistent site title across header, footer, and metadata).

quotes: create a clone website of darshan.ac.in but change the name, contact details, address and theme

acceptanceCriteria: The site layout and navigation are clearly inspired by darshan.ac.in (similar page/section structure), but all visible branding text uses the new institution name (no 'Darshan' references remain).
Browser tab title and any visible header/footer branding match the new institution name.
No external assets (images/icons) are hot-linked from darshan.ac.in.

requirements.text: Replace all contact details and address content across the site with the new contact details and new address, and centralize these values in a single frontend configuration object so they can be updated in one place without hunting through multiple components.

quotes: change the name, contact details, address

acceptanceCriteria: Contact phone/email/address shown anywhere on the site are sourced from a single configuration file/object (single source of truth).
Footer and Contact page (or equivalent contact section) display the updated contact details and address.
A basic on-screen search through the codebase for the old values finds none (no stale contact/address strings).

requirements.text: Apply a fresh, coherent visual theme that is different from darshan.ac.in, including a distinct color palette (avoid blue/purple), typography, button styling, and section layout rhythm; enforce this theme consistently across all pages and components.

quotes: change the name, contact details, address and theme

acceptanceCriteria: The site uses a consistent, non-blue/non-purple primary palette (e.g., warm neutrals + an accent) across header, buttons, links, and highlights.
Typography choices (headings/body) and spacing scale are consistent across pages.
Key interactive states (hover/focus/active) match the new theme and remain accessible (focus is clearly visible).

requirements.text: Implement the primary pages/sections commonly expected from the darshan.ac.in-style college site (e.g., Home, About, Academics/Departments, Admissions, Placements, News/Events, Contact) with responsive layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop, using English for all user-facing text.

quotes: create a clone website of darshan.ac.in

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation provides working routes/sections for the chosen set of pages that mirror the darshan.ac.in-style structure.
All pages render correctly on small screens (no horizontal overflow) and adapt layout at typical breakpoints.
All user-facing text in the app is in English.

requirements.text: Add a lightweight content strategy so the site can be populated without backend work: create structured frontend data files for repeated content (e.g., departments list, highlights, stats, events) and render sections from that data rather than hardcoding repeated markup.
acceptanceCriteria: At least two repeatable site sections (e.g., departments cards, events list) are rendered from a typed data structure.
Updating the data file changes rendered content without modifying component structure.
No backend canister changes are required to update this content.

requirements.text: Add generated, original static assets (logo/wordmark and a hero/banner illustration) and use them in the header and homepage hero section via the frontend public assets pipeline.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly from the frontend (not through the backend).
The new logo/wordmark is visible in the site header and footer (or equivalent branding area).
The homepage hero/banner uses the generated hero image and matches the new theme.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (authentication/actor hooks and main entry files); build the site using normal React composition around the template.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not copy or reuse darshan.ac.in proprietary text verbatim; create original English copy that is structurally similar but not duplicated.
Do not implement third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported, and authentication is not required for this marketing site).
Do not integrate external databases or third-party CMS.

required: Original logo/wordmark in a modern academic style, transparent background (campus-wordmark.dim_512x160.png)
Wide hero/banner illustration in the new theme, abstract campus/education motif (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
Simple monochrome icon set (4 icons) matching the theme (theme-icons-sprite.dim_512x512.png)
